title: E124 EDDIE HEARN SPEAKS OUT AFTER KSI VS LOGAN PRESS CONFERENCE - IMPAULSIVE EP. 124
itunes:title: EDDIE HEARN SPEAKS OUT AFTER KSI VS LOGAN PRESS CONFERENCE - IMPAULSIVE EP. 124
description:
Legendary boxing promoter Eddie Hearn reveals why he and DAZN purchased the KSI vs. Logan PAUL rematch, who he thinks will win, and finally comes face to face with Jake Paul about fighting on the undercard, despite expressing his reluctance to feature “YouTubers” on November 9.

BUY FIGHT TICKETS HERE: https://www.axs.com/events/381960/ksi...

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
